title: Greek Drama - Tragedy and Comedy (Modern Scholar)
description:
GREEK DRAMA - Tragedy and Comedy
14 lectures by Peter Meineck of New York University.

Professor Meineck provides an introduction to the great dramatists of ancient Greece, their key works and the development of drama in Greek culture. Of course these plays remain enormously influential.

01 Why Athens?
02 The Play's the Thing
03 Origins of Greek Drama
04 The Tragic Theatre
05 Aeschylus
06 The Oresteia - Our Only Trilogy
07 Agamemnon continued
08 Libation Bearers
09 The Furies
10 Sophocles
11 Sophocles - Oedipus Plays
12 Euripides
13 Euripides (Bacchae) and Aristophanes (Clouds)
14 Aristophanes 2

14 MP3 files @ 128 kbps
